label: 預所
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: An office manned by the Middle Family Officials (Chūshi), established in a manor (shōen) to administer the affairs of the estate, particularly the matter of taxation, in a manner satisfactory to the Lord of Manors (Ryōshu). [中司、荘園、領主]
